description: This is a shell script that serves as the top-level entry point for database preview setups. It delegates to other scripts like server.sh, startup.sh, and index.js to initialize and maintain database services, ensuring executable permissions, and setting up a health check server with fallback mechanisms.

methods.name: set -euo pipefail
methods.description: Configures bash to exit on errors, treat unset variables as errors, and pipefail mode.
